name: Tried Together
description:
Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 

Play with a friend in this hilarious couch co-op game where you and a friend try to escape jail while tied together.

Made with my awsome little sister.

Player 1 needs a Keyboard and Player 2 needs a Controller.

Music
https://freesound.org/people/frankum/sounds/384468/
